description: These roasted eggplant stacks make a colourful and veggie packed starter or light lunch option.
keywords: Roasted Eggplant Stacks with Goats Cheese, Pesto & Capsicum
name: Roasted Eggplant Stacks with Goats Cheese, Pesto & Capsicum Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Layer up the eggplant slices with roasted red capsicums, goats cheese, a drizzle of pesto and a little rocket, repeating until you have stacks. Serve with the remaining pesto, dressed rocket and toasted pine nuts.
